author: arnetheduck
content: we've considered proposing a flat file format that could be used for block (and possibly state) interchange between clients - the objective would a simply flat format that can be consumed mostly like a dump (but that coincides with the block request format such that these can be streamed directly from disk essentially - is there interest in this? https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/blob/master/docs/e2store.md is an initial writeup - in nimbus, we would likely use something like this for cold storage as well - it's fairly efficient that way, specially with the (optional) index
